name: RenÃ© DeAnda
title: Product Manager
summary: I'm a jack of all trades, master of none. Currently, I am a product manager at Microsoft. I love to learn new things by *[reading](https://goodreads.com/renedeanda)*, listening to *[podcasts](https://rede.io/what-startup-tech-podcasts/)*, asking lots of questions, and building new things that help others. I also love *[photography](https://unsplash.com/@renedeanda)*. Welcome!

projects.title: Delightful Gratitude Journal App
projects.summary: The Delightful mobile app is a lightweight gratitude journal for Android & iOS to record 3 good things from your day. Delightful was built with privacy in mind. The app includes backup, prompts, themes, & daily reminders.

testimonials.name: Delightful User in the US
testimonials.text: I've looked for an app like this for years. I like the simple yet thought provoking journal prompts. I get to reflect in areas I would normally not consider. ... Excellent job!

testimonials.name: Delightful User in Australia
testimonials.text: This is so easy to use. The prompts are great and it really helps to see your day through a grateful filter.

testimonials.name: Delightful User in New Zealand
testimonials.text: This is a simple app which does exactly what it says without unnecessary complexity. Perfect. Love it... and love the practice of listing 3 things daily. The time spent reflecting like this is new to me and definitely positive.

testimonials.name: Delightful User
testimonials.text: I love using this app as my gratitude journal. It has a beautiful and easy to use design with no unnecessary bells and whistles. The quote of the day is thought provoking and inspirational. What I love most though is the prompts ... Great app!

projects.title: Vina.Dev
projects.summary: Mobile optimized portfolio pages for developers to build their personal brands & find opportunity.

projects.title: Tech Viet - A View into Vietnam Tech
projects.summary: Vietnam Tech Ecosystem open-sourced. Tech Viet is an open-source website built with React & Next.js listing 200+ technology companies in Vietnam.

projects.title: Product Makr: Open-source PM Portfolios
projects.summary: Open-source project to help Product Managers make portfolio pages and improve their job hunt.

projects.title: Blissful Mobile App
projects.summary:
Blissful enabled you to track your mood & record your energy levels along with notes. Blissful's focus was on simplicity & making it easy to see trends in your daily life.
Blissful was the first full-stack product I built from scratch from an idea and wireframe sketches in my notebook. I've unpublished the app but it is still functional and I continue to use it daily.

projects.title: AdNotes Mobile App
projects.summary:
AdNotes is a digital marketing app to create text ads from your mobile phone in the form of expanded text ads. The app is great for digital marketing beginners to gain familiarity with creating text ads.
I created this application when I was actively using Google AdWords and wanted an easy way to see how expanded text ads looked from my phone. The app is open-source.

highlights.title: Case Study: Peloton In-app Social Community
highlights.summary: Should Peloton add an in-app social community for users to connect with one another?

highlights.title: What is a Good Product Manager to Peers?
highlights.summary: Some takeaways on what a good product manager is to peers.

theme.quote: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." - Oscar Wilde
